alt.name: Type
alt.description: Type of the program: either application or library.

and.name: Application
and.description: The product will be shipped as an application.

and.name: GUI
and.description: Graphical User Interface for editing images. Selecting this will make the library become an application.

and.name: Workspace
and.description: The main component of the GUI, showing the current image.

and.name: Navigation
and.description: Navigation Features allow transforming the displayed image (scaling, translating, shearing, rotating) by interacting with the Workspace in a proper manner.

feature.name: Zoom
feature.description: The user will be able to zoom the view of the Workspace. Though, any point in the image should be inspectable by zooming onto it. Zooming means scaling the image.

feature.name: Move
feature.description: Allows to move the image around. This is useful for zoomed views, where the image is greater than the viewport. Though the user is able to navigate to any part of the image without changing the zoom factor.

feature.name: Multi
feature.description: The Workspace area now contains multiple Workspaces, for editing multiple Images at the same time.

feature.name: ColourSelection
feature.description: A widget for the selection of the current working colour.

and.name: Tools
and.description: Enables support for Tools, that allow to edit the image through the Workspace.

feature.name: Pencil
feature.description: Allows drawing lines below the cursor onto the image in the current working colour.

feature.name: ChangeColor
feature.description: Changes all occurrences of a single color to another value.

and.name: AreaSelection
and.description: Connected subsets of the images can be selected for arbitrary purposes.

feature.name: CopyToClipboard
feature.description: Copies a selected area to the clipboard.

feature.name: Cut
feature.description: A part of an image can be cut out and moved around.

and.name: SelectionType
and.description: Specifies the possibilities to select areas.

feature.name: Library
feature.description: The product will be shipped as a library.

feature.name: ImageEditing
feature.description: Includes functionality for editing pixels of an image, like drawing circles.

and.name: ImageSaving
and.description: Images can be saved to disk.

feature.name: ImageSavingWizard
feature.description: Saving the current image file through a FileDialog.

and.name: ImageLoading
and.description: Loading of image files into memory.

feature.name: ImageLoadingArgs
feature.description: Loads an image to the Workspace, whose file path has been given as a program argument. This enforces the GUI feature.

feature.name: ImageLoadingWizard
feature.description: Loading an image file through a FileDialog.

feature.name: ImageLoadingDragAndDrop
feature.description: Images can be loaded, by dragging them from the OS into the application.
